heroTitle: Explore the majestic Peruvian Andes with Peru Excursions
heroSubtitle: Trek through ancient trails, uncover hidden gems, and immerse yourself in a journey of a lifetime. Start your adventure today.
emailSuccessDescription: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you within 24 hours!

contactDescription: Ready to start your Peruvian adventure? Send me a message or contact me directly via WhatsApp.
toursDescription: Discover our amazing tours in Peru. From trekking adventures to cultural experiences, find the perfect tour for your next adventure.
tryDifferentFilters: Try adjusting your filters to see more results
readyForAdventureText: Let's create an unforgettable Peruvian experience tailored just for you.
destinationsDescription: Discover the most beautiful destinations in Peru. From ancient citadels to colorful mountains, explore the wonders of the Andes.
planYourJourneyText: Ready to explore these incredible destinations? Let's create the perfect itinerary for your Peruvian adventure.
customTourDescription: Tell me about your dream Peru adventure and I'll create a personalized itinerary just for you. Every detail tailored to your interests, fitness level, and budget.
responseTime: I'll respond within 24 hours with a personalized itinerary proposal
customRequestSuccess: Thank you! I'll create a personalized itinerary and send it to you within 24 hours.
customRequestErrorDescription: There was an error sending your request. Please try WhatsApp instead.
experienceBreathtaking: Experience breathtaking landscapes, rich culture, and unforgettable adventures with our expert local guides through the heart of the Andes.
localKnowledge: Local knowledge and certified expertise for safe, informative tours
intimateGroupSizes: Intimate group sizes for personalized attention and flexibility
connectWithCommunities: Connect with local communities and traditional customs
safetyCoverage: Comprehensive safety measures and emergency protocols
transformativeJourney: Embark on a transformative journey through the heart of the Peruvian Andes. Our meticulously curated trips promise a harmonious blend of exhilarating adventure, cultural immersion, and awe-inspiring natural beauty.
ruggedAndeanPeaks: From rugged Andean peaks to mystical cloud forests
vibrantCommunities: Connect with vibrant local communities and traditions
memoriesLastLifetime: Create memories that will last a lifetime
localKnowledgeTrust: Local knowledge and safety you can trust
personalizedExperiences: We provide personalized experiences tailored to your interests and adventure level
ancientCitadels: From ancient citadels to vibrant markets, discover the most breathtaking destinations Peru has to offer with our expertly guided tours.
ancientRuins: From ancient ruins to breathtaking landscapes, explore Peru's most incredible destinations with our carefully crafted tour experiences.
readyExplore: Ready to explore Peru? Contact us to plan your perfect adventure. Our expert team is here to create unforgettable memories for you.
getBackWithin24: We'll get back to you within 24 hours
